channel.title: CVE Feed for Cybozu, Inc. -- Cybozu Office
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cybozu, Inc. -- Cybozu Office

item.title: CVE-2017-2114|2024-08-05T13:39:32.252Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20office
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Cybozu Office 10.0.0 to 10.5.0 allows remote authenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0704|2024-08-05T03:35:48.963Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20office
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in Cybozu Office 10.0.0 to 10.8.1 allows remote attackers to delete arbitrary files via Keitai Screen.

item.title: CVE-2018-0528|2024-08-05T03:28:11.059Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20office
item.description: Cybozu Office 10.0.0 to 10.7.0 allows authenticated attackers to bypass authentication to view the schedules that are not permitted to access via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0527|2024-08-05T03:28:11.177Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20office
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Cybozu Office 10.0.0 to 10.7.0 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0566|2024-08-05T03:28:11.216Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20office
item.description: Cybozu Office 10.0.0 to 10.8.0 allows authenticated attackers to bypass authentication to obtain the schedules without access privilege via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0565|2024-08-05T03:28:11.189Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20office
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Cybozu Office 10.0.0 to 10.8.0 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0567|2024-08-05T03:28:11.084Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20office
item.description: Cybozu Office 10.0.0 to 10.8.0 allows authenticated attackers to bypass access restriction to access and write non-public data via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0529|2024-08-05T03:28:11.191Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20office
item.description: Cybozu Office 10.0.0 to 10.7.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0703|2024-08-05T03:35:48.939Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20office
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in Cybozu Office 10.0.0 to 10.8.1 allows remote attackers to delete arbitrary files via HTTP requests.

item.title: CVE-2017-10857|2024-08-05T17:50:12.589Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20office
item.description: Cybozu Office 10.0.0 to 10.6.1 allows authenticated attackers to bypass access restriction to perform arbitrary actions via "Cabinet" function.

item.title: CVE-2017-2116|2024-08-05T13:39:32.279Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20office
item.description: Cybozu Office 10.0.0 to 10.5.0 allows remote authenticated attackers to bypass access restriction to delete "customapp" templates via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-2115|2024-08-05T13:39:32.370Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20office
item.description: Cybozu Office 10.0.0 to 10.5.0 allows remote authenticated attackers to bypass access restriction to obtain "customapp" information via unspecified vectors.
